com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.logging

Interface FlowLogger


  • public interface FlowLogger
    Logs events that may occur during the execution of a Flow.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void logConditionCompleted(UUID flowId, String description, boolean result)
      Log that a Condition has successfully completed.
      void logConditionException(UUID flowId, String description, Throwable exception)
      Log that execution of a Condition has failed with an exception.
      void logConditionStarted(UUID flowId, String description, Scratchpad scratchpad)
      Log that the execution of Condition has started.
      void logOperationCompleted(UUID flowId, String name, Key<?> outputKey, Object output)
      Log that an Operation has successfully completed.
      void logOperationException(UUID flowId, String name, Throwable exception)
      Log that execution of an Operation has failed with an exception.
      void logOperationStarted(UUID flowId, String name, Scratchpad scratchpad)
      Log that the execution of an Operation has started.

    • Method Detail

      • logOperationStarted

        void logOperationStarted(UUID flowId,
                         String name,
                         Scratchpad scratchpad)
        Log that the execution of an Operation has started.
        Parameters:
        flowId - The id of the running flow.
        name - The name of the Operation.
        scratchpad - The Scratchpad supplied to the Operation.

      • logOperationCompleted

        void logOperationCompleted(UUID flowId,
                           String name,
                           Key<?> outputKey,
                           Object output)
        Log that an Operation has successfully completed.
        Parameters:
        flowId - The id of the running flow.
        name - The name of the Operation.
        outputKey - The key to which the Operation's result will be written in the Scratchpad.
        output - The output of the Operation.

      • logOperationException

        void logOperationException(UUID flowId,
                           String name,
                           Throwable exception)
        Log that execution of an Operation has failed with an exception.
        Parameters:
        flowId - The id of the running flow.
        name - The name of the Operation.
        exception - The exception that was thrown.

      • logConditionStarted

        void logConditionStarted(UUID flowId,
                         String description,
                         Scratchpad scratchpad)
        Log that the execution of Condition has started.
        Parameters:
        flowId - The id of the running flow.
        description - The description of the Condition to be executed.
        scratchpad - The Scratchpad supplied to the Condition.

      • logConditionCompleted

        void logConditionCompleted(UUID flowId,
                           String description,
                           boolean result)
        Log that a Condition has successfully completed.
        Parameters:
        flowId - The id of the running flow.
        description - The description of the Condition that has completed.
        result - The result of the Condition.

      • logConditionException

        void logConditionException(UUID flowId,
                           String description,
                           Throwable exception)
        Log that execution of a Condition has failed with an exception.
        Parameters:
        flowId - The id of the running flow.
        description - The description of the Condition that failed.
        exception - The exception that was thrown.
